allow: Bash(echo "Testing company profile update with simple JSON..." curl -s -X PATCH "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""companyName"""":""""Updated Test"""",""""email"""":""""test@company.com"""",""""location"""":""""La Paz"""",""""city"""":""""La Paz"""",""""description"""":""""Test desc"""",""""category"""":""""business""""}')
Bash(echo "GET company profile - should show ''''Updated Test''''" curl -s -X GET "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
Bash(echo "=== TEST 1: Leer datos actuales ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")

Bash(echo "" echo "=== TEST 2: Guardar nuevo dato ===" curl -s -X PATCH "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""companyName"""":""""TEST NUEVO GUARDADO""""}')
Bash(echo "" echo "" echo "=== TEST 3: Leer datos después de guardar ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")

Bash(echo "=== TEST 2: Guardar nuevo dato ===" curl -s -X PATCH "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""companyName"""":""""TEST GUARDADO NUEVO 123""""}' echo "" echo "")
Bash(echo "=== TEST 3: Leer datos después de guardar ===" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
Bash(echo "TEST 3: Verificar que se guardó" curl -s "http://localhost:8000/api/profiles/company/$COMPANY_ID/" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "TEST 3: Verificar que se guardó")
Bash(cmd /c "rmdir /s /q node_modules\.vite dist .cache 2>nul; echo Directorios de cache eliminados")
